basicMoves.name: Scratch
basicMoves.description: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

basicMoves.name: Tackle
basicMoves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

basicMoves.name: Quick Attack
basicMoves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

basicMoves.name: Gust
basicMoves.description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

basicMoves.name: Vine Whip
basicMoves.description: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

basicMoves.name: Water Gun
basicMoves.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

basicMoves.name: Peck
basicMoves.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

basicMoves.name: Mach Punch
basicMoves.description: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

basicMoves.name: Wing Attack
basicMoves.description: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

basicMoves.name: Rock Throw
basicMoves.description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

basicMoves.name: Seed Bomb
basicMoves.description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

basicMoves.name: Surf
basicMoves.description: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.

basicMoves.name: Dazzling Gleam
basicMoves.description: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

basicMoves.name: Power Gem
basicMoves.description: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

basicMoves.name: X-Scissor
basicMoves.description: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

basicMoves.name: Pound
basicMoves.description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a foreleg, or the like.

basicMoves.name: Brick Break
basicMoves.description: The user attacks with a swift chop.

basicMoves.name: Extreme Speed
basicMoves.description: The user charges the target at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

basicMoves.name: Aqua Tail
basicMoves.description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

basicMoves.name: Hydro Pump
basicMoves.description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

basicMoves.name: Drill Peck
basicMoves.description: A corkscrewing attack that strikes the target with a sharp beak acting as a drill.

basicMoves.name: Earthquake
basicMoves.description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.

basicMoves.name: Ice Shard
basicMoves.description: The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

basicMoves.name: Aqua Jet
basicMoves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

basicMoves.name: Dragon Pulse
basicMoves.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

basicMoves.name: Dragon Claw
basicMoves.description: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws.

basicMoves.name: Ember
basicMoves.description: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

basicMoves.name: Thunder Shock
basicMoves.description: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

basicMoves.name: Thunderbolt
basicMoves.description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

basicMoves.name: Dragon Breath
basicMoves.description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

basicMoves.name: Poison Sting
basicMoves.description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.

basicMoves.name: Bite
basicMoves.description: The user bites the target with viciously sharp fangs to inflict damage.

basicMoves.name: Water Pulse
basicMoves.description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.

basicMoves.name: Rock Slide
basicMoves.description: Large boulders are hurled at opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.

basicMoves.name: Hyper Fang
basicMoves.description: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

basicMoves.name: Flamethrower
basicMoves.description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

basicMoves.name: Poison Powder
basicMoves.description: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.

basicMoves.name: Sleep Powder
basicMoves.description: The user scatters a cloud of sleep-inducing powder that makes the target drowsy.

basicMoves.name: Sludge Bomb
basicMoves.description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target to deal damage. This may also poison the target.

basicMoves.name: Confusion
basicMoves.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. This may also confuse the target.

basicMoves.name: Astonish
basicMoves.description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.

basicMoves.name: Confuse Ray
basicMoves.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

basicMoves.name: Air Slash
basicMoves.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.

basicMoves.name: Spark
basicMoves.description: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

basicMoves.name: Discharge
basicMoves.description: The user strikes everything around it by letting loose a flare of electricity. This may also cause paralysis.

basicMoves.name: Twister
basicMoves.description: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.

basicMoves.name: Thunder Wave
basicMoves.description: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.

basicMoves.name: Iron Head
basicMoves.description: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. This may also make the target flinch.

basicMoves.name: Psybeam
basicMoves.description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also leave the target confused.

basicMoves.name: Poison Jab
basicMoves.description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle, arm, or the like steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.

basicMoves.name: Stomp
basicMoves.description: The target is stomped with a big foot. This may also make the target flinch.

basicMoves.name: Lick
basicMoves.description: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

basicMoves.name: Bone Club
basicMoves.description: The user clubs the target with a bone. This may also make the target flinch.

basicMoves.name: Headbutt
basicMoves.description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.

basicMoves.name: Flame Wheel
basicMoves.description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

basicMoves.name: Extrasensory
basicMoves.description: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power. This may also make the target flinch.

basicMoves.name: Fire Blast
basicMoves.description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

basicMoves.name: Toxic
basicMoves.description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned.

basicMoves.name: Smog
basicMoves.description: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. This may also poison the target.

basicMoves.name: Sludge
basicMoves.description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.

basicMoves.name: Body Slam
basicMoves.description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

basicMoves.name: Dark Pulse
basicMoves.description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. This may also make the target flinch.

basicMoves.name: Hypnosis
basicMoves.description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

basicMoves.name: Icicle Crash
basicMoves.description: The user attacks by harshly dropping large icicles onto the target. This may also make the target flinch.

basicMoves.name: Ice Beam
basicMoves.description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.

basicMoves.name: Hurricane
basicMoves.description: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also confuse the target.

basicMoves.name: Thunder Punch
basicMoves.description: The target is punched with an electrified fist. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

basicMoves.name: Dynamic Punch
basicMoves.description: The user punches the target with full, concentrated power. This confuses the target if it hits.

basicMoves.name: Ice Punch
basicMoves.description: The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also leave the target frozen.

basicMoves.name: Megahorn
basicMoves.description: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.

basicMoves.name: Fire Punch
basicMoves.description: The target is punched with a fiery fist. This may also leave the target with a burn.

basicMoves.name: Karate Chop
basicMoves.description: The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily.

basicMoves.name: Razor Leaf
basicMoves.description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.

basicMoves.name: Cross Chop
basicMoves.description: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. Critical hits land more easily.

basicMoves.name: Slash
basicMoves.description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

basicMoves.name: Air Cutter
basicMoves.description: The user launches razor-like wind to slash opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.

basicMoves.name: Blaze Kick
basicMoves.description: The user launches a kick that lands a critical hit more easily. This may also leave the target with a burn.

basicMoves.name: Stone Edge
basicMoves.description: The user stabs the target from below with sharpened stones. Critical hits land more easily.

basicMoves.name: Drill Run
basicMoves.description: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.

basicMoves.name: Swift
basicMoves.description: Star-shaped rays are shot at opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

basicMoves.name: Aerial Ace
basicMoves.description: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.

basicMoves.name: Tri Attack
basicMoves.description: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. This may also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

basicMoves.name: Fire Fang
basicMoves.description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.

basicMoves.name: Ice Fang
basicMoves.description: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.

basicMoves.name: Thunder Fang
basicMoves.description: The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

basicMoves.name: Leaf Blade
basicMoves.description: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.

basicMoves.name: Night Slash
basicMoves.description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

basicMoves.name: Aura Sphere
basicMoves.description: The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This attack never misses.

basicMoves.name: Bullet Punch
basicMoves.description: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

basicMoves.name: Cross Poison
basicMoves.description: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

basicMoves.name: Fire Spin
basicMoves.description: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for five turns.

basicMoves.name: Whirlpool
basicMoves.description: The user traps the target in a violent swirling whirlpool for five turns.

basicMoves.name: Waterfall
basicMoves.description: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.

basicMoves.name: Will-O-Wisp
basicMoves.description: The user shoots a sinister flame at the target to inflict a burn.

basicMoves.name: Magical Leaf
basicMoves.description: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack never misses.

basicMoves.name: Power Whip
basicMoves.description: The user violently whirls its vines, tentacles, or the like to harshly lash the target.

basicMoves.name: Sand Tomb
basicMoves.description: The user traps the target inside a harshly raging sandstorm for five turns.

basicMoves.name: Zen Headbutt
basicMoves.description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. This may also make the target flinch.

basicMoves.name: Crabhammer
basicMoves.description: The target is hammered with a large pincer. Critical hits land more easily.

basicMoves.name: Sludge Wave
basicMoves.description: The user strikes everything around it by swamping the area with a giant sludge wave. This may also poison those hit.

basicMoves.name: Gunk Shot
basicMoves.description: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack. This may also poison the target.

basicMoves.name: Yawn
basicMoves.description: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

basicMoves.name: Wrap
basicMoves.description: A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and squeeze the target for five turns.

basicMoves.name: Disarming Voice
basicMoves.description: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

basicMoves.name: Sing
basicMoves.description: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.

basicMoves.name: Feint Attack
basicMoves.description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. This attack never misses.

basicMoves.name: Lava Plume
basicMoves.description: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

basicMoves.name: Powder Snow
basicMoves.description: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. This may also freeze opposing Pokémon.

basicMoves.name: Vital Throw
basicMoves.description: The user attacks last. In return, this throw move never misses.

basicMoves.name: Strength
basicMoves.description: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power.

basicMoves.name: Poison Fang
basicMoves.description: The user bites the target with toxic fangs. This may also leave the target badly poisoned.

basicMoves.name: Teleport
basicMoves.description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, if any. If a wild Pokémon uses this move, it flees.

basicMoves.name: Transform
basicMoves.description: The user transforms into a copy of the target right down to having the same move set.

basicMoves.name: Mean Look
basicMoves.description: The user affixes the foe with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

basicMoves.name: Fairy Wind
basicMoves.description: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it.

basicMoves.name: Hyper Voice
basicMoves.description: The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.

multipleHitMoves.name: Double Kick
multipleHitMoves.description: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

multipleHitMoves.name: Double Hit
multipleHitMoves.description: The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or a tentacle. The target is hit twice in a row.

multipleHitMoves.name: Twineedle
multipleHitMoves.description: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.

movesBasedOnLevelEntity.name: Seismic Toss
movesBasedOnLevelEntity.description: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

movesBasedOnLevelEntity.name: Night Shade
movesBasedOnLevelEntity.description: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

variableHitMoves.name: Fury Attack
variableHitMoves.description: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

variableHitMoves.name: Pin Missile
variableHitMoves.description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

variableHitMoves.name: Bone Rush
variableHitMoves.description: The user strikes the target with a hard bone two to five times in a row.

variableHitMoves.name: Rock Blast
variableHitMoves.description: The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five rocks are launched in a row.

variableHitMoves.name: Icicle Spear
variableHitMoves.description: The user launches sharp icicles at the target two to five times in a row.

variableHitMoves.name: Bullet Seed
variableHitMoves.description: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target two to five times in a row.

variableHitMoves.name: Fury Swipes
variableHitMoves.description: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes quickly two to five times in a row.

statsChangesMoves.name: Iron Tail
statsChangesMoves.description: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Sand Attack
statsChangesMoves.description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing the target's accuracy.

statsChangesMoves.name: Withdraw
statsChangesMoves.description: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Agility
statsChangesMoves.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Focus Energy
statsChangesMoves.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

statsChangesMoves.name: String Shot
statsChangesMoves.description: Opposing Pokémon are bound with silk blown from the user's mouth that harshly lowers the Speed stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Crunch
statsChangesMoves.description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Harden
statsChangesMoves.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Close Combat
statsChangesMoves.description: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

statsChangesMoves.name: Screech
statsChangesMoves.description: An earsplitting screech harshly lowers the target's Defense stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Smokescreen
statsChangesMoves.description: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target's accuracy.

statsChangesMoves.name: Psychic
statsChangesMoves.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Shadow Ball
statsChangesMoves.description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Bulldoze
statsChangesMoves.description: The user tramples its target into the ground, dealing damage. This also lowers the target's action speed.

statsChangesMoves.name: Acid
statsChangesMoves.description: Opposing Pokemon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stats.

statsChangesMoves.name: Bug Buzz
statsChangesMoves.description: The user generates a damaging sound wave by vibration. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Play Rough
statsChangesMoves.description: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Moonblast
statsChangesMoves.description: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target's offensive stats.

statsChangesMoves.name: Earth Power
statsChangesMoves.description: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Superpower
statsChangesMoves.description: The user attacks the target with great power. However, this also lowers the user's Attack and Defense stats.

statsChangesMoves.name: Icy Wind
statsChangesMoves.description: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers opposing Pokémon's Speed stats.

statsChangesMoves.name: Ancient Power
statsChangesMoves.description: The user attacks with a primeval power. This may also raise the user's offensive and defensive stats.

statsChangesMoves.name: Energy Ball
statsChangesMoves.description: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Flash Cannon
statsChangesMoves.description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. This may also lower the target's defensive stats.

statsChangesMoves.name: Swords Dance
statsChangesMoves.description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user's Attack stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Quiver Dance
statsChangesMoves.description: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

statsChangesMoves.name: Dragon Dance
statsChangesMoves.description: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that raises its Attack and Speed stats.

statsChangesMoves.name: Bubble Beam
statsChangesMoves.description: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. This may also lower the target's Speed stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Calm Mind
statsChangesMoves.description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

statsChangesMoves.name: Focus Blast
statsChangesMoves.description: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Bulk Up
statsChangesMoves.description: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, raising both its Attack and Defense stats.

statsChangesMoves.name: Leaf Storm
statsChangesMoves.description: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Rock Polish
statsChangesMoves.description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. This sharply raises the Speed stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Mud Shot
statsChangesMoves.description: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Hammer Arm
statsChangesMoves.description: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user's Speed.

statsChangesMoves.name: Amnesia
statsChangesMoves.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Mud-Slap
statsChangesMoves.description: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

statsChangesMoves.name: Acid Armor
statsChangesMoves.description: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Iron Defense
statsChangesMoves.description: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Metal Claw
statsChangesMoves.description: The target is raked with steel claws. This may also raise the user's Attack stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Scary Face
statsChangesMoves.description: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Flame Charge
statsChangesMoves.description: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks the target. Then, building up more power, the user raises its Speed stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Nasty Plot
statsChangesMoves.description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Aurora Bean
statsChangesMoves.description: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Muddy Water
statsChangesMoves.description: The user attacks by shooting muddy water at opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their accuracy.

statsChangesMoves.name: Meteor Mash
statsChangesMoves.description: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. This may also raise the user's Attack stat.

statsChangesMoves.name: Charge Beam
statsChangesMoves.description: The user attacks the target with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.

drainMoves.name: Giga Drain
drainMoves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

drainMoves.name: Absorb
drainMoves.description: The user attacks by draining the target's nutrients. Some of the damage dealt to the target is absorbed by the user to restore their own HP.

drainMoves.name: Drain Punch
drainMoves.description: An energy-draining punch. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

drainMoves.name: Leech Life
drainMoves.description: The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

recoilMoves.name: Take Down
recoilMoves.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.

recoilMoves.name: Flare Blitz
recoilMoves.description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack may leave the target with a burn.

recoilMoves.name: Double Edge
recoilMoves.description: A reckless, life-risking tackle in which the user rushes the target. This also damages the user quite a lot.

recoilMoves.name: Volt Tackle
recoilMoves.description: The user electrifies itself and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack may leave the target with paralysis.

healMoves.name: Recover
healMoves.description: The user recovers half of its maximum HP.

healMoves.name: Synthesis
healMoves.description: The user recovers half of its maximum HP.

healMoves.name: Slack Off
healMoves.description: The user recovers half of its maximum HP.

healMoves.name: Moonlight
healMoves.description: The user recovers half of its maximum HP.

healMoves.name: Soft-Boiled
healMoves.description: The user recovers half of its maximum HP.

healMoves.name: Roost
healMoves.description: The user lands and rests its body. This move restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP.

ultimateMoves.name: Hyper Beam
ultimateMoves.description: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can't move on the next turn.

ultimateMoves.name: Giga Impact
ultimateMoves.description: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user can't move on the next turn.

ultimateMoves.name: Rock Wrecker
ultimateMoves.description: The user launches a huge boulder at the target to attack. The user can't move on the next turn.

movesBasedOnHPEntity.name: Reversal
movesBasedOnHPEntity.description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

movesBasedOnHPEntity.name: Flail
movesBasedOnHPEntity.description: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. The less HP the user has, the greater the move's power.

chargedMovesEntity.name: Solar Beam
chargedMovesEntity.description: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can't move on the next turn.

chargedMovesEntity.name: Sky Attack
chargedMovesEntity.description: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. This may also make the target flinch.
chargedMovesEntity.chargeText: became cloaked in a harsh light!

rampageMovesEntity.name: Thrash
rampageMovesEntity.description: The user rampages and attacks for two turns. The user then becomes confused.

rampageMovesEntity.name: Outrage
rampageMovesEntity.description: The user rampages and attacks for two turns. The user then becomes confused.

rampageMovesEntity.name: Petal Dance
rampageMovesEntity.description: The user rampages and attacks for two turns. The user then becomes confused.
